src:
Armani našao retku šifru - prvi poraz Pešićeve Barse! Užasno veče Olimpijakosa...
Etore Mesina i njegovi igrači skinuli skalp do sada nepobedivom velikanu iz Španije - 83:70. Micov ubacio 16 poena

01 Nov 2019


Spektakl se očekivao, spektakl smo dobili. Olimpija iz Milana dočekala je lidera Barselonu u prepunom Mediolanum forumu i uspeo u fantastičnoj završnici da joj nanese prvi poraz ove sezone u Evroligi -  83:70.

Olimpija je ušla sa prednošću od sedam poena u poslednji minut i to posle vrlo važne trojke Serhija Rodrigeza i verovatno se to na kraju ispostavilo i kao najvažniji detalj meča. Na to se nadovezao i Džef Bruks trojkom, a onda je i Rodrigez prostrelio još trojku, pogodio je i Micov i tu je bio kraj za Barsu. Prvi poraz za Barsu, nema više neporaženih timova!
Kakva završnica, posebno poslednjih minut i po Armanija. Najefikasniji kod domaćina bio je Rodrigez sa 17 poena, dok je Micov dodao 16.  Brendon Dejvis je ubacio 15 za goste, a Nikola Mirotić je dodao dva poena manje.
Osećala se euforija u gradu mode i fudbala zato što Barselona stiže u Mediolanum forum, tribine su popunjene do poslednjeg mesta, a to kao da je malo uticalo na igru domaće ekipe koja je ušla malo stegnuto u meč što je hiperkvalitetna i iskusna ekipa Barselone iskoristila i došla do inicijalne prednosti.
Kako je vreme prolazilo, tako je Olimpija počela da daje gas, malo se opustila i uspela je da dođe do egal rezultata pre svega zbog dobre igre Vladimira Micova, a potom i Serhija Rodrigeza i Luisa Skole.



Barselonin voz je poput lokomotive unapred vukao Brendon Dejvis, dok su mu pomagali Nikola Mirotić i Kajl Kjurik i to je sve bilo dovoljno da tim Svetislava Pešića u poslednju četvrtinu uđe sa prednošću od šest poena razlike. Ali, to se na kraju pokazalo kao nedovoljno.
Sve je to davalo Barsi osećaj da drži sve pod kontrolom, ali je bilo jasno da Olimpija nekim dobrim potezima i eventualnom serijom može da zaprži čorbu Kataloncima.
I ta serija se dogodila, Skola je počeo da leti po parketu i Olimpija je na šest i po minuta uspela da dođe do izjednačenja - 58:58, a sa trojkom Dela Valea Armani je poveo 61:60m a onda je pogodio još jednu iz ćoška za delirijum u Mediolanum forumu. Tu je mogao domaćin da oseti miris pobede. A Rodrigez je trojkom srušio goste.
Kao što je to očigledno postala moda u Evroligi, i ovaj duel je morao da se rešava u poslednjim minutima. Tu je italijanski sastav bio onaj pravi i došao do velikog skalpa. Više nema nepobedivih u Evroligi.
A Olimpijakos ove sezone ne liči na sebe. Novi dokaz za tako nešto je večerašnji duel u kom je Olimpijakos dočekao Makabi u Pireju, a Ponos Izraela je izašao kao pobednik vrlo ubedljivo - 90:65. Možemo slobodno reći - užasno veče crveno-belih iz Atine koji su navikli navijače barem na dobre igre na svom parketu. Od toga nije bilo ništa.
Makabi je igrao sve bolje kako je utakmica odmicala i na kraju je lako slavio, čak i lakše nego što je i sam Ponos Izraela očekivao.
Najefikasniji kod Olimpijakosa bili su Jorgos Printezis sa 16 poena i Brendon Pol sa 12. Nikola Milutinov je podbacio sa samo tri poena. Goste su do pobede vodili Skoti Vilbekin i Tajler Dorsi sa po 19 datih poena.

EVROLIGA - 6. KOLO


Četvrtak

Crvena zvezda - Himki 90:78/Simanić 18 - Šved 14/
Panatinaikos - Anadolu Efes 86:70/Rajs 18 - Larkin 28/

Petak

Zenit - CSKA 70:87/Ajon 20 - Džejms 16/
Fenerbahče - Žalgiris 76:79/De Kolo 29 - Grigonis 19/
Valensija - Asvel 81:72/Dubljević 13 - Livio 20/
Olimpija Milano - Barselona 83:70/Rodrigez 17 - Dejvis 15/
Olimpijakos - Makabi 65:90/Printezis 16 - Vilbekin 19/ 21.00:  (1,30) Baskonija  (16,00)  Bajern (3,90) 21.00:  (1,03) Real Madrid  (28,00)  Alba (12,00) 
NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Armani finds rare code - Pesic Barca's first defeat! Awful night of Olympiakos ...
Etore Messina and his players take off the scalp of an unbeaten giant from Spain - 83:70. Micov scored 16 points

01 Nov 2019


The spectacle was expected, we got the spectacle. The Olympics from Milan welcomed the Barcelona leader in a crowded Mediolanum forum and managed in a fantastic finish to inflict her first defeat of the Euroleague this season - 83:70.

Olympia came in with a seven-point advantage in the final minute after a very important three by Serhi Rodriguez, and that probably turned out to be the most important detail of the match in the end. Jeff Brooks went for it with a threesome, and then Rodriguez shot another threesome, he also hit Micov, and that was the end for Barca. First loss to Barca, no more undefeated teams!
What a finish, especially in the last minutes and a half of Armani. The most efficient host was Rodrigez with 17 points, while Micov added 16. Brendon Davis scored 15 for the visitors and Nikola Mirotic added two points less.
There was a feeling of euphoria in the city of fashion and football as Barcelona arrived in the Mediolanum forum, the stands were filled to the last place, and it seemed to have little impact on the game of the home team, which got a little squeezed into the match, which the hyper-quality and experienced Barcelona team used and came to an initial advantage.
As time went on, so Olympia started to gas, relaxed a bit, and managed to reach egal results primarily because of the good play of Vladimir Micov, and then of Serhi Rodriguez and Luis Skola.



The Barcelona train was dragged in the form of a locomotive by Brendon Davis in advance, assisted by Nikola Mirotic and Kyle Kurik, and that was enough for Svetislav Pesic's team to enter the final quarter with a six-point advantage. But in the end, this proved to be insufficient.
All this gave Barca a sense of keeping things under control, but it was clear that with some good moves and a possible series, Olympia could keep the Catalans soup.
And that series happened, the school started flying around the parquet and Olympia managed to reach the equalizer for six and a half minutes - 58:58, and with Del Vale's triple Armani took 61: 60m and then hit another from the corner for delirium in the Mediolanum Forum. Here the host could smell the victory. And Rodriguez knocked down the guests with three.
As Euroleague fashion obviously became, this duel had to be dealt with in the final minutes. This is where the Italian band was the right one and came up with a big scalp. No more invincible in the Euroleague.
And Olympiakos doesn't look like himself this season. New evidence for this is tonight's duel in which Olympiakos welcomed Maccabi to Piraeus, and Israel's Pride came out victorious very convincingly - 90:65. We can safely say - a terrible evening of red and whites from Athens who used to get fans at least to have good games on their flooring. There was none of that.
Maccabi played better as the match progressed and was easily celebrated in the end, even easier than the Pride of Israel himself had expected.
The most efficient of the Olympiakos were George Printezis with 16 points and Brendon Paul with 12. Nikola Milutinov missed with only three points. The guests were led by Scottie Wilbeck and Tyler Dorsi with 19 points each.

EUROLEAGUE - DAY 6


Thursday

Red Star - Khimki 90: 78 / Simanic 18 - Swede 14 /
